languages.text: {n}Вы узнаете косматую рыжую бороду и цепкие черные глаза. Этот мужчина наблюдал за перепалкой блюстителя и одного из работников станции.{/n}
{n}You recognise the shaggy red beard and the keen black eyes. This is the man who was watching you during your encounter with the enforcer and the station worker.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы узнаете косматую рыжую бороду и цепкие черные глаза. Этот мужчина наблюдал за перепалкой блюстителя и одного из работников станции.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You recognise the shaggy red beard and the keen black eyes. This is the man who watched the squabble between an enforcer and a station worker.{/n}
{n}You recognise the shaggy red beard and the keen black eyes. This is the man who watched the squabble between an enforcer and a station worker.{/n}
{n}You recognise the shaggy red beard and the keen black eyes. This is the man who was watching you during your encounter with the enforcer and the station worker.{/n}
{n}You recognise the shaggy red beard and the keen black eyes. This is the man who was watching you during your encounter with the enforcer and the station worker.{/n}
{n}You recognise the shaggy red beard and the keen black eyes. This is the man who was watching you during your encounter with the enforcer and the station worker.{/n}
{n}You recognise the shaggy red beard and the keen black eyes. This is the man who was watching you during your encounter with the enforcer and the station worker.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Reconoces su barba pelirroja y descuidada y sus sagaces ojos negros. Es el hombre que te observaba durante tu encuentro con el guardia y el trabajador de la estación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recognise the shaggy red beard and the keen black eyes. This is the man who was watching you during your encounter with the enforcer and the station worker.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Reconoces su barba pelirroja y descuidada y sus sagaces ojos negros. Es el hombre que te observaba durante tu encuentro con el guardia y el trabajador de la estación.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ボサボサの赤い髭と鋭い黒い瞳に見覚えがある。エンフォーサーやステーション労働者と遭遇した際に、あなたを見ていた男だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recognise the shaggy red beard and the keen black eyes. This is the man who was watching you during your encounter with the enforcer and the station worker.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ボサボサの赤い髭と鋭い黒い瞳に見覚えがある。エンフォーサーやステーション労働者と遭遇した際に、あなたを見ていた男だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你认出了他脸上乱蓬蓬的红胡子和锐利的黑眼睛。之前，你看到执法者和车站的工人对峙时，这个人一直在盯着你看。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recognise the shaggy red beard and the keen black eyes. This is the man who was watching you during your encounter with the enforcer and the station worker.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你认出了他脸上乱蓬蓬的红胡子和锐利的黑眼睛。之前，你看到执法者和车站的工人对峙时，这个人一直在盯着你看。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du erkennst den struppigen roten Bart und die wachen schwarzen Augen. Das ist der Mann, der dich bei deiner Begegnung mit dem Enforcer und dem Stationsarbeiter beobachtet hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recognise the shaggy red beard and the keen black eyes. This is the man who was watching you during your encounter with the enforcer and the station worker.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du erkennst den struppigen roten Bart und die wachen schwarzen Augen. Das ist der Mann, der dich bei deiner Begegnung mit dem Enforcer und dem Stationsarbeiter beobachtet hat.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une barbe rousse hirsute, des yeux noirs d'une rare vivacité... Aucun doute : il s'agit de l'homme qui a assisté à votre entretien avec le prévôt et l'ouvrier de la station.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recognise the shaggy red beard and the keen black eyes. This is the man who was watching you during your encounter with the enforcer and the station worker.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une barbe rousse hirsute, des yeux noirs d'une rare vivacité... Aucun doute : il s'agit de l'homme qui a assisté à votre entretien avec le prévôt et l'ouvrier de la station.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Karşındaki darmadağınık kızıl sakalı ve keskin siyah gözleri tanıyorsun. İnfazcı ve istasyon işçisiyle karşılaştığında seni izleyen adamın ta kendisi bu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recognise the shaggy red beard and the keen black eyes. This is the man who was watching you during your encounter with the enforcer and the station worker.{/n}
